mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT t1.ID_ AS taskId, t1.NAME_ AS taskName, t2.NAME_ AS formKey, t2.BUSINESS_KEY_ AS businessKey, t2.PROC_INST_ID_ AS processId, DATE_FORMAT( t1.CREATE_TIME_, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS startTime FROM act_ru_task t1 INNER JOIN act_ru_execution t2 ON t1.PROC_INST_ID_ = t2.PROC_INST_ID_ LEFT JOIN act_ru_identitylink t3 ON t3.TASK_ID_ = t1.ID_ WHERE ( t1.ASSIGNEE_ = #{username} OR ( t1.ASSIGNEE_ IN ( SELECT G.group_id_ FROM act_id_membership G WHERE G.user_id_ = #{username} ) ) OR ( ( t1.ASSIGNEE_ IS NULL OR t1.ASSIGNEE_ = '' ) AND ( t3.USER_ID_ = #{username} OR t3.GROUP_ID_ IN ( SELECT g.group_id_ FROM act_id_membership g WHERE g.user_id_ = #{username} ) ) ) )
